mapper.select: select order.order_no as orderNo ,member.member_id as memberId ,category.category_name as categoryName ,item.item_name as itemName ,item.item_price as itemPrice ,order.order_count as orderCount ,order.order_date as orderDate ,item.item_no as itemNo from `order` join member join item join category on `order`.member_no = member.member_no and `order`.item_no = item.item_no and item.category_no = category.category_no WHERE member.member_no = #{member.memberNo} order by order_no DESC
select order_count as orderCount from `order` where member_no = #{member.memberNo} and item_no = #{item.itemNo}
select count(*) from `order` where member_no = #{member.memberNo} and item_no = #{item.itemNo}
